author: smuzaffar
body:
#### PR description:

Although these are public headers but are not suppose to be included directly e.g
- `*TkRotation.h`: These are included via `ThRotation.h`
- `*Basic*DVector`: These headers are exposed via `Basic*DVector.h`
- `AVXVec.h`: This is included via `SSEVec.h` 

 This PRs move these headers in interface/private directory. This will help building CXXModules for all headers of package/interface directory. 

#### PR validation:

cms-checkdeps and local build works
title: move header in private directory
